00036 using namespace std;
00037 using namespace Eigen;
00041 class Particle2D {
00042 public:
00043   vector2f loc, lastLoc;
00044   float angle;
00045   float weight;
00046 public:
00047   Particle2D() {weight = angle = 0.0; loc.zero();}
00048   Particle2D(float _x, float _y, float _theta, float _w) { loc.set(_x,_y); lastLoc.set(-DBL_MAX,-DBL_MAX); angle = _theta; weight = _w;}
00049   Particle2D(vector2f _loc, float _theta, float _w) { loc = _loc; angle = _theta; weight = _w;}
00050   bool operator<(const Particle2D &other) {return weight<other.weight;}
00051   bool operator>(const Particle2D &other) {return weight>other.weight;}
00052 };
00053
